bfd.help: Enable/disable Protocol Independent Multicast (PIM) Bidirectional Forwarding Detection (BFD).
bfd.name: bfd

options.help: Enable Protocol Independent Multicast (PIM) Bidirectional Forwarding Detection (BFD).
options.name: enable

options.help: Disable Protocol Independent Multicast (PIM) Bidirectional Forwarding Detection (BFD).
options.name: disable

cisco-exclude-genid.help: Exclude GenID from hello packets (compatibility with old Cisco IOS).
cisco-exclude-genid.name: cisco-exclude-genid

options.help: Do not send GenID.
options.name: enable

options.help: Send GenID according to standard.
options.name: disable

hello-holdtime.help: Time before old neighbor information expires (0 - 65535 sec, default = 105).
hello-holdtime.name: hello-holdtime

hello-interval.help: Interval between sending PIM hello messages (0 - 65535 sec, default = 30).
hello-interval.name: hello-interval

access-group.help: Groups IGMP hosts are allowed to join.
access-group.name: access-group

immediate-leave-group.help: Groups to drop membership for immediately after receiving IGMPv2 leave.
immediate-leave-group.name: immediate-leave-group

last-member-query-count.help: Number of group specific queries before removing group (2 - 7, default = 2).
last-member-query-count.name: last-member-query-count

last-member-query-interval.help: Timeout between IGMPv2 leave and removing group (1 - 65535 msec, default = 1000).
last-member-query-interval.name: last-member-query-interval

query-interval.help: Interval between queries to IGMP hosts (1 - 65535 sec, default = 125).
query-interval.name: query-interval

query-max-response-time.help: Maximum time to wait for a IGMP query response (1 - 25 sec, default = 10).
query-max-response-time.name: query-max-response-time

query-timeout.help: Timeout between queries before becoming querying unit for network (60 - 900, default = 255).
query-timeout.name: query-timeout

router-alert-check.help: Enable/disable require IGMP packets contain router alert option.
router-alert-check.name: router-alert-check

options.help: Require Router Alert option in IGMP packets.
options.name: enable

options.help: don't require Router Alert option in IGMP packets
options.name: disable

version.help: Maximum version of IGMP to support.
version.name: version

options.help: Version 3 and lower.
Version 2 and lower.
Version 1.

passive.help: Enable/disable listening to IGMP but not participating in PIM.
passive.name: passive

options.help: Listen only.
options.name: enable

options.help: Participate in PIM.
options.name: disable

options.help: sparse-mode
options.name: sparse-mode

options.help: dense-mode
options.name: dense-mode

propagation-delay.help: Delay flooding packets on this interface (100 - 5000 msec, default = 500).
propagation-delay.name: propagation-delay

rp-candidate.help: Enable/disable compete to become RP in elections.
rp-candidate.name: rp-candidate

options.help: Compete for RP elections.
options.name: enable

options.help: Do not compete for RP elections.
options.name: disable

rp-candidate-group.help: Multicast groups managed by this RP.
rp-candidate-group.name: rp-candidate-group

rp-candidate-interval.help: RP candidate advertisement interval (1 - 16383 sec, default = 60).
rp-candidate-interval.name: rp-candidate-interval

rpf-nbr-fail-back.help: Enable/disable fail back for RPF neighbor query.
rpf-nbr-fail-back.name: rpf-nbr-fail-back

options.help: Enable fail back for RPF neighbor query.
options.name: enable

options.help: Disable fail back for RPF neighbor query.
options.name: disable

rpf-nbr-fail-back-filter.help: Filter for fail back RPF neighbors.
rpf-nbr-fail-back-filter.name: rpf-nbr-fail-back-filter

state-refresh-interval.help: Interval between sending state-refresh packets (1 - 100 sec, default = 60).
state-refresh-interval.name: state-refresh-interval

static-group.help: Statically set multicast groups to forward out.
static-group.name: static-group

ttl-threshold.help: Minimum TTL of multicast packets that will be forwarded (applied only to new multicast routes) (1 - 255, default = 1).
ttl-threshold.name: ttl-threshold

options.help: Enable IP multicast routing.
options.name: enable

options.help: Disable IP multicast routing.
options.name: disable

accept-register-list.help: Sources allowed to register packets with this Rendezvous Point (RP).
accept-register-list.name: accept-register-list

accept-source-list.help: Sources allowed to send multicast traffic.
accept-source-list.name: accept-source-list

bsr-allow-quick-refresh.help: Enable/disable accept BSR quick refresh packets from neighbors.
bsr-allow-quick-refresh.name: bsr-allow-quick-refresh

options.help: Allow quick refresh packets.
options.name: enable

options.help: Do not allow quick refresh packets.
options.name: disable

bsr-candidate.help: Enable/disable allowing this router to become a bootstrap router (BSR).
bsr-candidate.name: bsr-candidate

options.help: Allow this router to function as a BSR.
options.name: enable

options.help: Do not allow this router to function as a BSR.
options.name: disable

bsr-interface.help: Interface to advertise as candidate BSR.
bsr-interface.name: bsr-interface

cisco-crp-prefix.help: Enable/disable making candidate RP compatible with old Cisco IOS.
cisco-crp-prefix.name: cisco-crp-prefix

options.help: Do not allow sending group prefix of zero.
options.name: enable

options.help: Allow sending group prefix of zero.
options.name: disable

cisco-ignore-rp-set-priority.help: Use only hash for RP selection (compatibility with old Cisco IOS).
cisco-ignore-rp-set-priority.name: cisco-ignore-rp-set-priority

options.help: Ignore RP-SET priority value.
options.name: enable

options.help: Do not ignore RP-SET priority value.
options.name: disable

cisco-register-checksum.help: Checksum entire register packet(for old Cisco IOS compatibility).
cisco-register-checksum.name: cisco-register-checksum

options.help: register checksum entire packet.
options.name: enable

options.help: Do not register checksum entire packet.
options.name: disable

cisco-register-checksum-group.help: Cisco register checksum only these groups.
cisco-register-checksum-group.name: cisco-register-checksum-group

message-interval.help: Period of time between sending periodic PIM join/prune messages in seconds (1 - 65535, default = 60).
message-interval.name: message-interval

null-register-retries.help: Maximum retries of null register (1 - 20, default = 1).
null-register-retries.name: null-register-retries

register-rate-limit.help: Limit of packets/sec per source registered through this RP (0 - 65535, default = 0 which means unlimited).
register-rate-limit.name: register-rate-limit

register-rp-reachability.help: Enable/disable check RP is reachable before registering packets.
register-rp-reachability.name: register-rp-reachability

options.help: Check target RP is unicast reachable before registering.
options.name: enable

options.help: Do not check RP unicast reachability.
options.name: disable

register-source.help: Override source address in register packets.
register-source.name: register-source

options.help: Use source address of RPF interface.
options.name: disable

options.help: Use primary IP of an interface.
options.name: interface

options.help: Use a local IP address.
options.name: ip-address

register-supression.help: Period of time to honor register-stop message (1 - 65535 sec, default = 60).
register-supression.name: register-supression

rp-register-keepalive.help: Timeout for RP receiving data on (S,G) tree (1 - 65535 sec, default = 185).
rp-register-keepalive.name: rp-register-keepalive

spt-threshold.help: Enable/disable switching to source specific trees.
spt-threshold.name: spt-threshold

options.help: Switch to Source tree when available.
options.name: enable

options.help: Do not switch to Source tree when available.
options.name: disable

spt-threshold-group.help: Groups allowed to switch to source tree.
spt-threshold-group.name: spt-threshold-group

options.help: Allow source specific multicast.
options.name: enable

options.help: Do not allow source specific multicast.
options.name: disable

ssm-range.help: Groups allowed to source specific multicast.
ssm-range.name: ssm-range

route-threshold.help: Generate warnings when the number of multicast routes exceeds this number, must not be greater than route-limit.
route-threshold.name: route-threshold
